explains: n. 滑稽模仿作品（文章、音乐作品或表演的滑稽仿作等）；拙劣的模仿，荒诞不经的事
v. 夸张地演绎，滑稽地模仿

sentences.en: There seems to be something like a gentle parody, maybe even a mocking tone that fills the lines of the elder brother's ecstatic speech.
sentences.cn: 似乎有一种温柔的戏仿，可能甚至是一种嘲弄的语气，充满了哥哥狂热的演讲中。

sentences.en: The trial was a parody of justice.
sentences.cn: 那次审判是对正义的嘲弄。

sentences.en: It was like a parody of the balcony scene from Romeo and Juliet.
sentences.cn: 它就像《罗密欧与朱丽叶》阳台上那一幕的模仿作。
